      • withVolume

        public MPCHostBuilder withVolume​(int volume,
                                 int amount)
        Setting the volume
        Overrides:
        withVolume in class MPCBuilder<MPCHost>
        Parameters:
        volume - the requested amount or the provided amount
        amount - the number of atp units provided - if > 1 then volume and price are ignored
        Returns:
        HOST Builder instance

      • withResourcePool

        public MPCHostBuilder withResourcePool​(dk.alexandra.fresco.suite.spdz.configuration.PreprocessingStrategy strategy,
                                       int modBitLength,
                                       ATPManager.Function priceEvaluation,
                                       CmdLineParser.obliviousTransferProtocol obliviousTransferProtocol)
                                throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        ResourcePool setter. Overwritten in order to add the pricing function to the ATPManager. The pricing function is evaluated in the end of the protocol.
        Parameters:
        strategy - Preprocessing strategy as defined by FRESCO
        modBitLength - Bit length of the underlying modulus
        priceEvaluation - Evaluation function of the protocol
        obliviousTransferProtocol - OT protocol used by FRESCO
        Returns:
        HostBuilder instance
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - unknown inputs to FRESCO result in a ParseException

        Returns:
        HostBuilder instance
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - results, when inconsistencies are found in the input

      • build

        public MPCHost build()
        The build method of the builder. used to instantiate the ifxhost object according to the members in the builder.
